name: oneTap – Easy Google Sign In Prompt
author: Exlac

sections.description:
ğŸ‘ï¸Plugin Demo | ğŸ“ƒDocumentation | ğŸš€Pro Version | ğŸ‘©ğŸ¼â€ğŸ’»Support

Get 77% more conversion using Google One Tap Sign In! Additionally, One Tap Sign In can also help increase customer retention by making the login process more convenient for users. This can lead to higher engagement and repeat visits to your website. Not only that, but One Tap Sign In also offers an added layer of security, as it ensures that only the user’s verified social media account is used for login. This can help prevent fraudulent activity and protect your website from potential security threats. Overall, implementing One Tap Sign In can greatly benefit your website by increasing conversion rates, customer retention, and overall security.

Why Google One Tap

Let’s check out the industry players, they all are using Google One Tap Sign In.

ğŸ‘‰ Tripadvisor
ğŸ‘‰ Yelp
ğŸ‘‰ Booking.com
ğŸ‘‰ trivago
ğŸ‘‰ Medium
ğŸ‘‰ Fiverr

This embedded UX feature allows an end user to sign in directly when a Google iframe is embedded into your web pages, enabling a frictionless user sign-in experience. The Automatic sign-in option allows users to sign in without having to go through the traditional login process, making it more convenient and user-friendly. This feature eliminates the need for users to remember multiple usernames and passwords, as they can simply use their existing Google account to sign in. This can lead to increased conversion rates, as users are more likely to complete a purchase or take other desired actions when the login process is quick and easy. It also offers an added layer of security, as it ensures that only the user’s verified Google account is used for login.

Features

ğŸ”¥ Instant login popup
ğŸ”¥ Login button in login pages
ğŸ”¥ Quick login in Directorist login and registration pages
ğŸ”¥ Shortcode to show login button
ğŸ”¥ Exclude in a single post(any custom post type)
ğŸ”¥ Exclude in pages*
ğŸ”¥ Default user role*
ğŸ”¥ Auto signin
ğŸ”¥ Custom login and siginup URL control*
ğŸ”¥ Signin context*
ğŸ”¥ Toggle outside tap to close One Tap
ğŸ”¥ Add sub-domain support*
ğŸ”¥ Delay showing popup*

*Requires Additional Purchase

1.0.3

1.0.2

  • New – Option to controle data updating on sign in
  • Fix – User data updating on sign in

1.0.1

  • Fix – Console error

1.0.0

  • Initial release

short_description: oneTap - One Tab Google Sign In plugin allows you to get more users for your shop, directory, magazine, portal, and booking site.
